name:
Photoderm
PEDIATRICS Spray SPF50+
description: Spray sunscreen that provides very high protection for the sensitive skin of children and babies, resistant to water and sand.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Apply generously and evenly to face and body before sun exposure. Spray into your hand before applying to face. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Suitable for use by children over 1 year old.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Specially developed for the sensitive skin of children and babies, Sun Barrier Technology* provides broad-spectrum protection against UVB, long and short UVA rays.

name: Photoderm PEDIATRICS Mineral SPF50+
description: 100% mineral filter sunscreen that provides very high protection for the sensitive skin of newborn babies and children, resistant to water and sand.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Apply generously and evenly to the face and body before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Suitable for use by babies aged 0-36 months.   Babies and children should not be exposed directly to the sun and should wear appropriate protective clothing, but they may still be exposed to UV rays despite all precautions. In such cases, you can choose Photoderm Pediatrics Mineral on exposed areas of the skin.

name: Sensibio H2O LIMITED EDITION
description: Micellar make-up remover water that does not require rinsing for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for morning/evening use

  • Step 1 Moisten a cotton pad with Sensibio H2O.
  • Step 2 Gently cleanse your skin and/or remove make-up from your face and around your eyes.
  • Step 3 Reapply until completely removed.
  • Step 4 Suitable for everyday use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

NAOS is the inventor of Micellar technology. Inspired by the natural lipids in the skin, Micellar Particles are micro-droplets that cleanse the skin of dirt and makeup. This technology protects the skin barrier while cleansing the skin of dirt and makeup.

name: Sensibio Defensive Cream
description: A daily moisturizing care cream with antioxidant effect that strengthens the defense mechanism of sensitive and susceptible skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be used once or twice a day, in the morning and evening.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel.
  • Step 2 Can be applied to the face and neck area.
  • Step 3 Can be used as a make-up base.

    Apply to healthy skin. This product is not a medicine. Consult your dermatologist or pharmacist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Sensitive skin can be caused by two different reasons. Natural and permanent sensitivity on the skin due to genetic/hereditary reasons or triggered and temporary sensitivity on the skin due to environmental factors.

Sensibio Defensive, thanks to its antioxidant Defensive Technology, which aims to strengthen the skin's own defense mechanism especially against oxidative stress, acts against both sensitivities, strengthens the skin's natural barrier and provides softness and flexibility to the skin against internal and external factors.

The patented DAF complex helps increase skin tolerance levels thanks to the rhamnose, mannitol and xylitol it contains. Sensibio Defensive is suitable for daily use on normal and combination sensitive skin.

Dermatologically tested.

Sensibio Defensive Cream aims to strengthen the skin's natural barrier by acting against factors that cause skin sensitivity and to soothe the skin by moisturizing it against internal and external factors, thanks to its Defensive Technology™, which has an antioxidant effect and aims to strengthen the skin's own defense mechanism especially against oxidative stress, daily external factors, environmental factors, pollution and harmful rays of the sun.

Vitamin E and carnosine provide a skin-protective antioxidant effect by renewing the skin's antioxidant defenses.

Red sage extract acts against permanent sensitivity caused by nerve fibers and triggered sensitivity caused by environmental factors such as pollution. In this way, it provides a double anti-inflammatory effect.

Helps increase the skin's tolerance level. Sensibio Defensive Cream is suitable for daily use of normal, combination and sensitive skin.

See resources
See resources

1. Evaluation of the efficacy of Sensibio Defensive under dermatological evaluation in 33 adults of Asian origin with sensitive skin for 28 days.

2. Evaluation of the effect of Sensibio Defensive by volunteers as a result of a usage test conducted with 33 volunteers for 28 days.

3. Evaluation of the effect of Defensive Technology against intracellular oxidative stress assessed by H2DCFDA staining on engineered human epidermis exposed and/or not to pollution and UVA, Synelvia, 2020 (NLL-STB20022FR)

4. Clinical study conducted with 29 volunteers

Proven Effectiveness

  • 97 % It soothes and moisturizes the skin, helping to soothe it. (1)
  • 94 % Improves the quality of life of people with sensitive skin. (2)
  • 75% Protects the skin against pollution and harmful sun rays. (3)
  • 50 % reduction in skin sensitivity in 28 days. (4)
See resources
See resources

1. Evaluation of the efficacy of Sensibio Defensive under dermatological evaluation in 33 adults of Asian origin with sensitive skin for 28 days.

2. Evaluation of the effect of Sensibio Defensive by volunteers as a result of a usage test conducted with 33 volunteers for 28 days.

3. Evaluation of the effect of Defensive Technology against intracellular oxidative stress assessed by H2DCFDA staining on engineered human epidermis exposed and/or not to pollution and UVA, Synelvia, 2020 (NLL-STB20022FR)

4. Clinical study conducted with 29 volunteers

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

It provides a strong antioxidant effect with the unique technology Carnosine + Vitamin E, which strengthens the skin's own defense mechanism and helps prevent skin sensitivity thanks to the antioxidants it contains, a strengthening effect on the skin's natural barrier with Tetrapeptide-10, and a double anti-inflammatory effect with Red sage extract.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

tabs.title: Detailed Content Information
tabs.html:
In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. Ask.Naos is a platform that transparently shares the ingredients of the NAOS brands (Bioderma, Institut Esthederm and Etat Pur). Designed to provide a high level of transparency, this platform shows you everything you need to know about the origin and role of the ingredients and patents based on NAOS' ecobiology principles. For the past 40 years, NAOS has respected the natural resources and mechanisms of the skin that need to be protected in order to have a healthier and more beautiful skin in the long term.

Discover All Content and Details at ask.NAOS.com.tr

Sensibio Defensive Cream aims to strengthen the skin's natural barrier by acting against factors that cause skin sensitivity and to soothe the skin by moisturizing it against internal and external factors, thanks to its Defensive Technology™, which has an antioxidant effect and aims to strengthen the skin's own defense mechanism especially against oxidative stress, daily external factors, environmental factors, pollution and harmful rays of the sun.

Vitamin E and carnosine provide a skin-protective antioxidant effect by renewing the skin's antioxidant defenses.

Red sage extract acts against permanent sensitivity caused by nerve fibers and triggered sensitivity caused by environmental factors such as pollution. In this way, it provides a double anti-inflammatory effect.

Helps increase the skin's tolerance level. Sensibio Defensive Cream is suitable for daily use of normal, combination and sensitive skin.

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Sensitive skin can be caused by two different reasons. Natural and permanent sensitivity on the skin due to genetic/hereditary reasons or triggered and temporary sensitivity on the skin due to environmental factors.

Sensibio Defensive Rich, thanks to its antioxidant-effective Defensive Technology, which aims to strengthen the skin's own defense mechanism especially against oxidative stress, acts against both sensitivities, strengthens the skin's natural barrier and provides softness and flexibility to the skin against internal and external factors.

The patented DAF complex helps increase skin tolerance levels thanks to the rhamnose, mannitol and xylitol it contains. Sensibio Defensive is suitable for daily use on normal and combination sensitive skin.

Dermatologically tested.

Sensibio Defensive Rich Cream aims to strengthen the skin's natural barrier by acting against factors that cause skin sensitivity and to soothe the skin by moisturizing it against internal and external factors, thanks to its Defensive Technology TM , which has an antioxidant effect and aims to strengthen the skin's own defense mechanism especially against oxidative stress, daily external factors, environmental factors, pollution and harmful rays of the sun.

Vitamin E and carnosine provide a skin-protective antioxidant effect by renewing the skin's antioxidant defenses.

Red sage extract acts against permanent sensitivity caused by nerve fibers and triggered sensitivity caused by environmental factors such as pollution. In this way, it provides a double anti-inflammatory effect.

Helps increase the skin's tolerance level. Sensibio Defensive Rich Cream is suitable for daily use of dry, very dry and sensitive skin.

See resources
See resources

2. Evaluation of the effect of Sensibio Defensive by volunteers as a result of a usage test conducted with 33 volunteers for 28 days.

3. Evaluation of the effect of Defensive Technology against intracellular oxidative stress assessed by H2DCFDA staining on engineered human epidermis exposed and/or not to pollution and UVA, Synelvia, 2020 (NLL-STB20022FR)

4. Clinical study conducted with 29 volunteers

Proven Effectiveness

  • 97 % It soothes and moisturizes the skin, helping to soothe it. (1)
  • 94 % Improves the quality of life of people with sensitive skin. (2)
  • 75% Protects the skin against pollution and harmful sun rays. (3)
  • 50 % reduction in skin sensitivity in 28 days. (4)

name: Sébium FOAMING GEL ACTIVE
description: Intensive purifying cleansing gel against acne, pimples and blackheads

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning and evening use.

  • Step 1 Make sure to wash your hands before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Apply the product to damp skin and lather.
  • Step 3 Rinse thoroughly then pat dry gently.
  • Step 4 Suitable for face and body use.

Remember to apply as recommended by your dermatologist.

  • Step 1: With the guidance of your dermatologist, it can be used morning and evening for mild acne-prone skin, while for moderate acne-prone skin, Sébium Foaming Gel can be preferred in the morning and Sébium Foaming Gel Active in the evening.
  • Step 2 Drying, peeling acne treatments are recommended to be used only under the guidance of your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: PROVEN EFFECT
tabs.html:
Cleansing the skin is one of the first and most important steps of any skin care routine. It prepares the skin for the next care product by removing impurities (oil, bacteria, cosmetics, make-up, dust, sweat, dead cells, sun filters and all other particles).

If the skin is not cleaned regularly in the morning and evening, the skin loses its health: the hydrolipidic film cannot fulfill its protective role and the pores begin to clog. As a result, blackheads and acne begin to form, causing the skin to become dull and to have uneven skin tone. In combination, oily or acne-prone skin, skin cleansing becomes even more important in order to remove oil from the skin due to excess sebum production.

Dermatologically tested.

EFFECTIVE CLEANING:

SMOOTHING & PURIFYING EFFECT:

Salicylic acid 1.8% : keratolytic and comedolytic effect

Glycolic acid 1%: keratolytic effect

*pH : 4.5 to optimize the effectiveness of glycolic acid

Zinc gluconate 3%: Sebum regulating effect

PERFECT TOLERANCE:

Caprylyl-Capryl glucoside: Gentle, cleansing that protects the skin's natural flora

*Only 1 surfactant use

It protects the skin's natural barrier by preventing transepidermal water loss.

See resources
See resources

*ALLERGISA test conducted on 33 volunteers aged 18-35 with oily skin and mild to moderate acne lesions, October 2021

**Oily and light to medium skin for 21 days under dermatological supervision
Clinical study conducted on 30 volunteers with severe acne lesions,
October 2020

Proven Effectiveness

97% Cleansed and Purified Skin*

72% Effective Against Clogged Pores*

32% Anti-Acne Effect**

See resources
See resources

*ALLERGISA test conducted on 33 volunteers aged 18-35 with oily skin and mild to moderate acne lesions, October 2021

**Oily and light to medium skin for 21 days under dermatological supervision
Clinical study conducted on 30 volunteers with severe acne lesions,
October 2020

name: Sébium FOAMING GEL ACTIVE
description: Intensive purifying cleansing gel against acne, pimples and blackheads

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning and evening use.

  • Step 1 Make sure to wash your hands before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Apply the product to damp skin and lather.
  • Step 3 Rinse thoroughly then pat dry gently.
  • Step 4 Suitable for face and body use.

Remember to apply as recommended by your dermatologist.

  • Step 1: With the guidance of your dermatologist, it can be used morning and evening for mild acne-prone skin, while for moderate acne-prone skin, Sébium Foaming Gel can be preferred in the morning and Sébium Foaming Gel Active in the evening.
  • Step 2 Drying, peeling acne treatments are recommended to be used only under the guidance of your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Cleansing the skin is one of the first and most important steps of any skin care routine. It prepares the skin for the next care product by removing impurities (oil, bacteria, cosmetics, make-up, dust, sweat, dead cells, sun filters and all other particles).

If the skin is not cleaned regularly in the morning and evening, the skin loses its health: the hydrolipidic film cannot fulfill its protective role and the pores begin to clog. As a result, blackheads and acne begin to form, causing the skin to become dull and to have uneven skin tone. In combination, oily or acne-prone skin, skin cleansing becomes even more important in order to remove oil from the skin due to excess sebum production.

Dermatologically tested.

EFFECTIVE CLEANING:

SMOOTHING & PURIFYING EFFECT:

Salicylic acid 1.8% : keratolytic and comedolytic effect

Glycolic acid 1%: keratolytic effect

*pH : 4.5 to optimize the effectiveness of glycolic acid

Zinc gluconate 3%: Sebum regulating effect

PERFECT TOLERANCE:

Caprylyl-Capryl glucoside: Gentle, cleansing that protects the skin's natural flora

*Only 1 surfactant use

It protects the skin's natural barrier by preventing transepidermal water loss.

See resources

name: Cicabio Hand Cream
description: A nourishing, water-resistant hand cream that soothes damaged hands by moisturizing them, reduces itching and tension caused by dryness in the hands, and helps repair and protect the skin barrier.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for Use:

  • Step 1 Clean the area where the product will be applied beforehand.
  • Step 2 Apply as much product as the skin needs to the relevant area.
  • Step 3 Can be reused within 3 days.

    It is suitable for use by adults, teenagers and children (ages 3 and up).

    If skin irritation persists, consult your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Along with our face, our hands are the most visible part of our body. Therefore, they are exposed to external factors quite a lot.

Our skin is our primary barrier against external factors such as stress and environmental factors; it protects us against these factors. However, it is quite difficult to protect our hands against daily external factors and intense dryness. Changing weather conditions, difficult home environment, detergent use, dermatoses, working conditions during the day, contact with chemical products cause damage to the hands.

Cicabio Hand Cream moisturizes and soothes the hands. It helps repair the skin's natural barrier by reducing itching and tension in the hands and protects the hands against external factors. Thanks to its water resistance, it continues to protect the skin even after washing hands or using disinfectants.

Dermatologically tested.

  • Cicabio Hand Cream provides a protective film effect on the skin.
  • Thanks to its balm texture, it helps protect the skin's natural barrier.
  • Thanks to the Antalgicine™ patent, it soothes the skin by helping to eliminate itching and discomfort caused by dryness.
  • Moisturizes and nourishes the skin for 8 hours.
  • The patented DAF complex helps raise the skin's tolerance threshold.
  • It is easily absorbed by the skin.
  • It does not leave an oily or sticky feeling on the skin.
See resources
See resources

(1) Dermatologically controlled use test with 33 volunteers with damaged and irritated hands (in a professional and domestic context) for 21 days, Mauritius, 2020

Proven Effectiveness

91% of those who tried it stated that Cicabio Hand Cream has a soothing effect against itching sensation caused by dryness in the hands. (1)

See resources
See resources

(1) Dermatologically controlled use test with 33 volunteers with damaged and irritated hands (in a professional and domestic context) for 21 days, Mauritius, 2020

name: Sebium Kerato+
description: High tolerance moisturizing gel cream that prevents the formation of acne, blackheads and acne spots.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for daily use, morning and evening.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin thoroughly with Sébium Foaming Gel and/or Sébium Foaming Gel Active.
  • Step 2 Apply the product to your entire face or indicated areas.

    Avoid contact with eyes.

    Do not forget to consult your dermatologist if necessary.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Acne problem can manifest itself with blackheads and white or red pimples. Pimples occur in cases where sebum is secreted more than necessary. The skin starts to oil more than necessary and causes the skin to shine.

The increase in sebum in the skin is usually due to hormonal reasons. Therefore, acne increases on the face and body, especially during adolescence. This acne problem, called teenage acne or teenage acne, can cause young people to lose their self-confidence. In later ages, especially in women, acne problems called adult acne, where intense acne attacks are observed, can occur due to hormonal reasons.

Especially with the sebum structure of acne-prone skin being dense, many external factors in our daily lives such as environmental and air pollution, cigarette smoke, and heavy metals in the air cause the skin pores to get dirty and cause pore blockage problems. As a result, pimples and blackheads begin to form.

Unless the acne problem is treated, it can negatively affect people's psychological health with an increase in severe acne.

People with acne-prone skin who are receiving medication may also experience different skin concerns such as dryness, irritation, irritation and skin redness as a result of the drying treatment they apply. In this case, it is very important for people to adapt to the treatment method determined with the help of a dermatologist. In order for the treatment to be sustainable, products that provide high tolerance on the skin and aim to increase the quality of life of people come to the fore. In order to increase the quality of life of people, the acne treatment process should be followed with the help of a dermatologist and it should not be forgotten that acne, blackheads or acne problems require long-term treatment.

The results have been proven by clinical studies.

STRONG KERATOLYTIC EFFECT AND HIGH TOLERANCE AGAINST ACNE, TOGETHER

SMOOTHING AND ANTI-BLACKHEAD MOISTURIZING CARE

1.8% Salicylic acid: Anti-pore and anti-blackhead effect

10% Malic acid ester: Moisturizing and sebum balancing effect

Suitable for skin pH: 4.5 pH.

See resources
See resources

*User test conducted on 30 volunteers with oily and acne-prone skin under dermatological control, Eurofins n 0 20E5071

97% High Tolerance*

41% Anti-Acne Effect*

36% Reduction in the Appearance of Acne Spots*

See resources
See resources

*User test conducted on 30 volunteers with oily and acne-prone skin under dermatological control, Eurofins n 0 20E5071

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

name: Matricium MATRICIUM
description: An antioxidant care capsule consisting of 53 elements found in the skin itself, which supports the renewal and strengthening of the skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply 1 capsule morning and evening to clean and dry skin on the face, eye contour and neck area and use before your daily skin care product. You can use the product up to 12 hours after opening the cap. Suitable for all skin types and ages 25 and over. High tolerance. Use on sensitive and irritated skin according to your dermatologist's advice. Suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding women.

      Avoid contact with eyes.

      Contains small parts: keep away from children.

name: Sébium LOTION
description: Toner that helps tighten pores for combination, oily, acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied to the face twice a day, morning and evening. It especially enhances the effect of the moisturizing care cream used afterwards.

  • Step 1 Sébium H2O can be applied morning and/or evening to skin cleansed with Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium Foaming Gel Active.
  • Step 2 Apply Sébium Lotion by massaging with your fingertips or using a cotton pad before applying your daily skincare products.

    Avoid contact with eyes. Suitable for use from 12 years of age.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Photoderm AKN Matte SPF30
description: Long-lasting anti-acne sunscreen with mattifying effect for combination, oily and acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Sunscreens should be used in summer and winter and periodically throughout the day.

  • Step 1 Shake the can well before use.
  • Step 2 Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure.
  • Step 3: Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying.
  • Step 4 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. name: Photoderm AKN Matte SPF30
description: Long-lasting anti-acne sunscreen with mattifying effect for combination, oily and acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Sunscreens should be used in summer and winter and periodically throughout the day.

  • Step 1 Shake the can well before use.
  • Step 2 Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure.
  • Step 3: Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying.
  • Step 4 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

name: Photoderm ANTI OX SUN PROTECTIVE WATER SPF50 200 ML
description: Antioxidant and anti-aging dual-phase sunscreen suitable for face, body and hair use.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Sunscreens should be used in summer and winter and periodically throughout the day.

  • Step 1 SHAKE WELL until you obtain a homogeneous mixture.
  • Step 2 Apply the product generously before sun exposure. Spray your hands before applying to your face and then apply.
  • Step 3 Re-apply after swimming, sweating and towel drying. It is recommended not to come into contact with fabric.
  • Step 4 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

name: Sensibio AR
description: A soothing and moisturizing care cream that helps relieve redness for sensitive skin with redness problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Cleanse your skin with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel. Apply Sensibio AR BB Cream in the morning and Sensibio AR Cream at night to clean skin.

During sunny periods, it is recommended to use the sunscreen product Photoderm AR, which has been specially developed for sensitive skin and skin with redness problems.

It is suitable for use 7 days a week, morning and/or evening.

      Apply to healthy skin. This product is not a medicine. Consult your dermatologist or pharmacist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Redness is usually caused by the dilation and weakening of microvessels in the skin. This patented compound acts against the factors that cause changes in microvessels.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

tabs.title: Detailed Content Information
tabs.html:
In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. Ask.Naos is a platform that transparently shares the ingredients of the NAOS brands (Bioderma, Institut Esthederm and Etat Pur). Designed to provide a high level of transparency, this platform shows you everything you need to know about the origin and role of the ingredients and patents based on NAOS' ecobiology principles. For the past 40 years, NAOS has respected the natural resources and mechanisms of the skin that need to be protected in order to have a healthier and more beautiful skin in the long term.

Discover All Content and Details at ask.NAOS.com.tr

name: Sensibio AR
description: A soothing and moisturizing care cream that helps relieve redness for sensitive skin with redness problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Cleanse your skin with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel. Apply Sensibio AR BB Cream in the morning and Sensibio AR Cream at night to clean skin.

During sunny periods, it is recommended to use the sunscreen product Photoderm AR, which has been specially developed for sensitive skin and skin with redness problems.

It is suitable for use 7 days a week, morning and/or evening.

      Apply to healthy skin. This product is not a medicine. Consult your dermatologist or pharmacist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Redness is usually caused by the dilation and weakening of microvessels in the skin. This patented compound acts against the factors that cause changes in microvessels.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Photoderm AR SPF50+
description: Tinted sunscreen for skin with redness problems

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Shake the can well before use. Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Redness is usually caused by the dilation and weakening of microvessels in the skin. This patented compound acts against the factors that cause changes in microvessels.

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. name: Sensibio AR+ BI-SERUM
description: A soothing dual-action serum that targets signs of aging for sensitive skin prone to redness*; helps eliminate the appearance of redness*.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
• Apply a few drops morning and/or evening to your skin and neck after having been previously cleansed with Sensibio AR+ Micellar Gel and/or Sensibio Foaming Gel.
  • Complete your skin care routine with Sensibio AR+ Cream.
  • Shake well before use.

      Do not forget to consult your dermatologist if necessary.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Reduces the appearance of redness by 79%*

Reduces the appearance of wrinkles by 71%*

See resources
See resources

*Clinical study conducted over 28 days with 42 participants with reactive sensitive skin prone to redness and signs of aging, percentage of satisfaction (France, 2024) Redness: Redness due to sensitivity and dryness

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

It aims to affect the factors that cause redness and sensitivity.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

description: A gentle cleanser, make-up remover and soothing micellar gel that does not require rinsing for sensitive skin prone to redness*.

name: Cicabio Arnica+
description: Repairing care cream for damaged skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is applied to the skin by massaging 1-2 times a day. It is suitable for face and body use. Adults, teenagers and babies (except premature babies) can use it.

      It should not be used by people who are sensitive to the Arnica plant. Contact with eyes, mucous membranes and open wounds should be avoided. It can be used in pregnant women upon doctor's advice.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

name: Photoderm BRONZE Dry Oil SPF30
description: Sunscreen in dry oil form that accelerates the tanning process

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Shake the can well before use. Apply generously and evenly before sun exposure. Suitable for face, body and hair. For face use, squeeze the product into the palm of your hand and apply. Can be applied to wet or dry skin. Should be reapplied every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Should not be exposed directly to the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to the Cellular Protection™ patent in its formula, it helps protect cells against harmful UV rays and prevents premature aging of the skin. With its maximum anti-UVB effect and unique UVA inhibitor performance, it provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun.**

name: Photoderm Bronze Sun Protective Water SPF30 200 ML
description: A dual-phase sunscreen suitable for face, body and hair use that helps accelerate natural tanning and increases the permanence of the tan.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Sunscreens should be used in summer and winter and periodically throughout the day.

  • Step 1 SHAKE WELL until you obtain a homogeneous mixture.
  • Step 2 Apply the product generously before sun exposure. Spray onto your hands before applying to your face.
  • Step 3: Reapply after swimming, sweating and towel drying.
  • Step 4 It is recommended not to come into contact with the fabric.
  • Step 5 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

The BRONZE COMPLEX biologically stimulates the melanogenesis process thanks to a complex of active ingredients that acts on 2 levels: - Induces melanogenesis: activates the enzyme responsible for the production of melanin by the melanocytes (tyrosinase) - Supplies essential elements: tyrosinase cofactor (copper) and melanin precursor (tyrosine) Thus, it reinforces the natural skin's self-defense abilities against UV rays.

name: Photoderm BRONZE Dry Oil SPF30
description: Sunscreen in dry oil form that accelerates the tanning process

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Shake the can well before use. Apply generously and evenly before sun exposure. Suitable for face, body and hair. For face use, squeeze the product into the palm of your hand and apply. Can be applied to wet or dry skin. Should be reapplied every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Should not be exposed directly to the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to the Cellular Protection™ patent in its formula, it helps protect cells against harmful UV rays and prevents premature aging of the skin. With its maximum anti-UVB effect and unique UVA inhibitor performance, it provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun.**

name: Photoderm Bronze Sun Protective Water SPF30 200 ML
description: A dual-phase sunscreen suitable for face, body and hair use that helps accelerate natural tanning and increases the permanence of the tan.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Sunscreens should be used in summer and winter and periodically throughout the day.

  • Step 1 SHAKE WELL until you obtain a homogeneous mixture.
  • Step 2 Apply the product generously before sun exposure. Spray onto your hands before applying to your face.
  • Step 3: Reapply after swimming, sweating and towel drying.
  • Step 4 It is recommended not to come into contact with the fabric.
  • Step 5 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

The BRONZE COMPLEX biologically stimulates the melanogenesis process thanks to a complex of active ingredients that acts on 2 levels: - Induces melanogenesis: activates the enzyme responsible for the production of melanin by the melanocytes (tyrosinase) - Supplies essential elements: tyrosinase cofactor (copper) and melanin precursor (tyrosine) Thus, it reinforces the natural skin's self-defense abilities against UV rays.

name: Pigmentbio C-Concentrate
description: An intensive night serum with fresh vitamin C that helps reduce the appearance of spots, brightens and peels for sensitive skin with intense blemish problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
After cleansing with Pigmentbio H2O or Pigmentbio Foaming Cream, apply 5 drops every evening for 1 month, 4 to the face (forehead, cheeks, chin) and 1 to the neck. It can be used alone at night or in combination with Pigmentbio Night Renewer, and during the day with Pigmentbio Daily Care SPF 50+.

  • Step 1 BEFORE opening the product, press your thumb firmly on the cap to release the fresh vitamin C.
  • Step 2 Unscrew and remove the temporary cap. Make sure all the fresh vitamin C is used.
  • Step 3 Screw the serum dropper into place and close tightly.
  • Step 4: Shake well for 10 seconds to ensure the fresh vitamin C is mixed evenly.
  • Step 1 BEFORE opening the product, firmly press your thumb on the cap to release the fresh vitamin C. Unscrew and remove the temporary cap. Make sure all the fresh vitamin C is used.
  • Step 2 Screw the serum dropper into place and close tightly.
    Shake well for 10 seconds to ensure the fresh vitamin C is mixed evenly.

Avoid contact with the eye area. It is especially recommended to follow the instructions for use. Depending on the mechanism of action, it may cause a tingling sensation, which disappears quickly, but if sensitivity persists, stop using the product and consult your dermatologist.

It should only be used at night and the skin should be thoroughly cleaned with a suitable cleansing product in the morning.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Melanin is a pigment found naturally in the skin that gives it color. Irregular and excessive melanin production causes dark spots and color inequality. This technology supports the regulation of melanin production and cell renewal to remove excess melanin.

tabs.title: Detailed Content Information
tabs.html:
In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. Ask.Naos is a platform that transparently shares the ingredients of the NAOS brands (Bioderma, Institut Esthederm and Etat Pur). Designed to provide a high level of transparency, this platform shows you everything you need to know about the origin and role of the ingredients and patents based on NAOS' ecobiology principles. For the past 40 years, NAOS has respected the natural resources and mechanisms of the skin that need to be protected in order to have a healthier and more beautiful skin in the long term.

name: ABCDerm Change Intensive
description: Anti-nappy rash water-based daily care cream

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Several times a day - 7 days a week

  • Step 1 Apply a thick layer to cleansed and thoroughly dried skin with one of the ABCDerm cleansing products at each diaper change.

    Can be used on newborns except premature babies. Apply to healthy skin. If redness persists, consult a healthcare professional. For hygienic reasons, we recommend that you close the product tightly after use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

tabs.html: Apply to the skin after the moisturizing care cream. For a homogeneous distribution, apply the product from the center of the face outwards. Shake the can well before use. Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The high-tech Sun Active Defense™ patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun** with its strengthened content against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays.

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

tabs.html:
• Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure.

• It should be repeated especially after swimming and activities that prevent the product from remaining on the skin surface.

name: Hydrabio Cream
description: A densely textured moisturizing care cream for dry to very dry, dehydrated and sensitive skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: It can be applied once or twice a day, in the morning and/or evening, to the face and neck area that has been previously cleansed with Hydrabio H2O or Hydrabio Milky Cleanser and treated with Hydrabio Tonique.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Water and lipids are indispensable components for the skin as they keep the skin moist. If there is any imbalance in the skin, moisture loss occurs and the skin begins to function improperly. This patented complex supports the synthesis of skin lipids and aquaporins. These "water channels", which have the task of transporting water to the epidermal cells, are found in the natural structure of the skin.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

tabs.title: Detailed Content Information
tabs.html:
In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. Ask.Naos is a platform that transparently shares the ingredients of the NAOS brands (Bioderma, Institut Esthederm and Etat Pur). Designed to provide a high level of transparency, this platform shows you everything you need to know about the origin and role of the ingredients and patents based on NAOS' ecobiology principles. For the past 40 years, NAOS has respected the natural resources and mechanisms of the skin that need to be protected in order to have a healthier and more beautiful skin in the long term.

Discover All Content and Details at ask.NAOS.com.tr

It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

name: Atoderm Cream Ultra
description: Ultra moisturizing, nourishing and protective care cream for dry skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied once or twice a day.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin with Atoderm Shower Gel or Atoderm Shower Oil.
  • Step 2 Apply Atoderm Cream Ultra to face and body areas.
  • Step 3 Gently rub until the cream is absorbed into your skin.

    If skin dryness persists, consult your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to the Skin Protect™ complex, it deeply moisturizes the skin and helps soothe the feeling of discomfort and tension caused by dryness. It provides a nourishing effect.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Cicabio Cream+ SPF 50+
description: A sensitive skin care cream that repairs the skin's barrier, is soothing and ultra-moisturizing, and contains anti-blemish effective UV protection.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is applied to sensitive skin twice a day after cleansing until the skin heals. It is suitable for face and body use.

      Do not forget to consult your dermatologist if necessary.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
88% REPAIRS THE SKIN BARRIER*

IT EFFECTS ON 3 TYPES OF COLLAGEN*

INCREASES MICROBIOME DIVERSITY IN 3 HOURS**

See resources
See resources

*Healing rate on the 7th day in the area where Optimal Repair Complex was applied to the damaged skin compared to the area where it was not applied, in vitro test

**Clinical study on restoration of skin microbiome diversity, conducted with 20 users aged 23-50 (France, 2023)

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Discomfort and itching sensations can disrupt the skin's natural repair processes. This technology helps regulate skin reactivity.

Supports the skin's natural healing process.

name: Pigmentbio Daily Care SPF 50+
description: A brightening and sun-protective day care cream that helps reduce the appearance of spots for sensitive skin with blemish problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply in the morning to the cleansed face and neck with Pigmentbio H2O or Pigmentbio Foaming Cream. It is an excellent make-up base. In case of prolonged sun exposure, it is recommended to reapply every two hours.


      Renew every two hours in case of prolonged sun exposure.

      Suitable for adult use only.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Melanin is a pigment found naturally in the skin that gives it color. Irregular and excessive melanin production causes dark spots and color inequality. This technology supports the regulation of melanin production and cell renewal to remove excess melanin.

name: Pigmentbio Daily Care SPF 50+
description: A brightening and sun-protective day care cream that helps reduce the appearance of spots for sensitive skin with blemish problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply in the morning to the cleansed face and neck with Pigmentbio H2O or Pigmentbio Foaming Cream. It is an excellent make-up base. In case of prolonged sun exposure, it is recommended to reapply every two hours.


      Renew every two hours in case of prolonged sun exposure.

      Suitable for adult use only.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Melanin is a pigment found naturally in the skin that gives it color. Irregular and excessive melanin production causes dark spots and color inequality. This technology supports the regulation of melanin production and cell renewal to remove excess melanin.

name: Sensibio DS+ Cream
description: Care cream for sensitive skin that experiences discomfort, redness, flaking and excessive oiliness due to oily skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied once or twice a day to skin previously cleansed with Sensibio DS+ Foaming Gel or Sensibio H2O.

It is suitable for use 7 days a week, morning and/or evening.

Cream shampoo Nodé DS+ Shampoo is recommended for adults with oily flaking problems on the scalp.

      Do not apply to irritated or leaking skin. Consult your doctor.

name: Sensibio DS+ Foaming Gel
description: Purifying cleansing gel for sensitive skin that has increased discomfort caused by oily skin and oily flaking problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is applied to damp skin and then rinsed thoroughly. It can be applied once or twice a day. It is applied without touching the eye area. After using Sensibio DS+ Foaming Gel, it is recommended to apply the face care cream Sensibio DS+ Cream. For adults, Nodé DS+ Shampoo is recommended for oily flaking problems on the scalp.

      Avoid contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

Malassezia is naturally found in the skin. When the scalp secretes too much sebum, the rate of Malassezia increases, causing problems such as dandruff, flaking and itching. This patented compound regulates sebum secretion and helps limit the reproduction of Malassezia.

name: Node DS+ Shampoo
description: Detergent-free shampoo for recurring oily flaking problems

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Gently massage your scalp to create a lather. Leave it on for 5 minutes and then rinse your hair with plenty of water. Apply 3 times a week for the first 3 weeks. After that, it can be applied once or twice a week depending on your needs. Suitable for combined use with Nodé Fluid

      For adult use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Nodé Fluide Shampoo is recommended afterwards and/or as an alternative use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
The problem of oily flaking on the scalp manifests itself with the formation of recurring yellow and oily plaques. It usually manifests itself with a reddened appearance and itching problem.

The results have been proven by clinical studies.

It helps to eliminate the problem of oily flaking on the scalp (1)
-83% reduction in redness appearance after 2 months
-78% decrease in flaking after 2 months
-77% reduction in itching sensation after 2 months

See resources
See resources

*Multicenter clinical study: Efficacy on scalps with seborrheic dermatitis (percentages were tracked by researchers who monitored the study).

name: Node DS+ Shampoo
description: Detergent-free shampoo for recurring oily flaking problems

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Gently massage your scalp to create a lather. Leave it on for 5 minutes and then rinse your hair with plenty of water. Apply 3 times a week for the first 3 weeks. After that, it can be applied once or twice a week depending on your needs. Suitable for combined use with Nodé Fluid

      For adult use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Nodé Fluide Shampoo is recommended afterwards and/or as an alternative use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
The problem of oily flaking on the scalp manifests itself with the formation of recurring yellow and oily plaques. It usually manifests itself with a reddened appearance and itching problem.

The results have been proven by clinical studies.

It helps to eliminate the problem of oily flaking on the scalp (1)
-83% reduction in redness appearance after 2 months
-78% decrease in flaking after 2 months
-77% reduction in itching sensation after 2 months

See resources
See resources

*Multicenter clinical study: Efficacy on scalps with seborrheic dermatitis (percentages were tracked by researchers who monitored the study).

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Malassezia is naturally found in the skin. When the scalp secretes too much sebum, the rate of Malassezia increases, causing problems such as dandruff, flaking and itching. This patented compound regulates sebum secretion and helps limit the reproduction of Malassezia.

name: Sébium EXFOLIATING GEL
description: Exfoliating cleansing gel for combination, oily and acne-prone skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be used once or twice a week.

  • Step 1 Make sure you clean your hands before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Pour the product into your hand.
  • Step 3 Apply to your face by massaging in circular motions for 1-2 minutes.
  • Step 4 Rinse your face and pat dry gently.

    Avoid contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sensibio Eye Contour Gel
description: Soothing and moisturizing care cream for sensitive and intolerant eye area.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied once or twice a day to the eye area that has been previously cleansed with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel.

It is applied by gently massaging with fingertips until it is absorbed by the skin.

You can apply it 7 days a week, morning and/or evening.

Make-up can be applied afterwards.

Also suitable for contact lens wearers.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Sensitive skin fights against harsh external factors by secreting molecules that cause excessive reactivity and cause sensations of heat, itching, tingling and redness. This patented compound helps increase the skin's resistance by inhibiting the production of these molecules.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sensibio Eye+
description: A moisturizing eye cream that provides anti-fatigue effect for the delicate eye area and helps reduce the appearance of dark circles, fine lines and puffiness.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied morning and evening to the eye area that has been previously cleansed with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel. It is applied to the skin by gently massaging. It is a good make-up base. It is suitable for contact lens wearers.

  • Step 1 FOR ANTI-EYE PUFFINESS EFFECT
    -Using your index, middle and ring fingers, apply pressure under your eyes in an upward motion 4 times. Repeat 3 times.
  • Step 2 FOR ANTI-FINE LINE AND ANTI-WRINKLE EFFECT
    -Using your index and middle fingers, gently massage the product from the inside out (lower and upper eyelids). Repeat 3 times.
  • Step 3 FOR ANTI-DARK CIRCLE EFFECT
    Use your index and middle fingers to perform a dynamic massage upwards with light touches to the under-eye area. Repeat 3 times.

    Do not forget to consult your dermatologist if necessary.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
82% Reduces swelling*

75% reduces fine lines around the eyes*

75% Reduces the appearance of blue and brown dark circles*

See resources
See resources

*Use test on 33 participants aged 26 to 65 with sensitive skin and tired eye contour (dark circles, puffiness, fine lines, wrinkles (crow's feet)) under dermatological and ophthalmological control, 28 days, percentage of satisfaction.

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

It provides a strong antioxidant effect with the unique technology Carnosine + Vitamin E, which strengthens the skin's own defense mechanism and helps prevent skin sensitivity thanks to the antioxidants it contains, a strengthening effect on the skin's natural barrier with Tetrapeptide-10, and a double anti-inflammatory effect with Red sage extract.

name: Sensibio Eye+
description: A moisturizing eye cream that provides anti-fatigue effect for the delicate eye area and helps reduce the appearance of dark circles, fine lines and puffiness.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied morning and evening to the eye area that has been previously cleansed with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel. It is applied to the skin by gently massaging. It is a good make-up base. It is suitable for contact lens wearers.

  • Step 1 FOR ANTI-EYE PUFFINESS EFFECT
    -Using your index, middle and ring fingers, apply pressure under your eyes in an upward motion 4 times. Repeat 3 times.
  • Step 2 FOR ANTI-FINE LINE AND ANTI-WRINKLE EFFECT
    -Using your index and middle fingers, gently massage the product from the inside out (lower and upper eyelids). Repeat 3 times.
  • Step 3 FOR ANTI-DARK CIRCLE EFFECT
    Use your index and middle fingers to perform a dynamic massage upwards with light touches to the under-eye area. Repeat 3 times.

    Do not forget to consult your dermatologist if necessary.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
82% Reduces swelling*

75% reduces fine lines around the eyes*

75% Reduces the appearance of blue and brown dark circles*

See resources
See resources

*Use test on 33 participants aged 26 to 65 with sensitive skin and tired eye contour (dark circles, puffiness, fine lines, wrinkles (crow's feet)) under dermatological and ophthalmological control, 28 days, percentage of satisfaction.

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

It provides a strong antioxidant effect with the unique technology Carnosine + Vitamin E, which strengthens the skin's own defense mechanism and helps prevent skin sensitivity thanks to the antioxidants it contains, a strengthening effect on the skin's natural barrier with Tetrapeptide-10, and a double anti-inflammatory effect with Red sage extract.

name: Node Fluid Shampoo
description: A fluid formula shampoo suitable for frequent use for all hair types.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: After lathering by gently massaging your scalp, rinse with plenty of water. Repeat the application if necessary. Suitable for daily use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The use of certain cleansing agents can alter the structure of the scalp’s protective layer, which can lead to irregularities. Created by NAOS Research, Nodé is the first detergent-free shampoo for hair and scalp. This gentle, scalp-friendly cleansing base provides effective cleansing without damaging the protective hydrolipidic layer on the skin’s surface.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: ABCDerm Foaming Cleanser
description: A gentle, tear-free cleansing gel for babies and children's faces, bodies and hair.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Once or twice a day.

  • Step 1 Apply to wet skin and hair.
  • Step 2 Lather.
  • Step 3 Rinse thoroughly.
  • Step 4 Pat dry gently.

    It can be used on newborn babies. (Except premature babies). Apply to healthy skin. After using the product, close the cap tightly.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

name: Pigmentbio Foaming Cream
description: A peeling effective cleansing gel that helps to even out and brighten the skin tone of sensitive skin with blemish problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply morning and evening to damp skin, lather and rinse thoroughly.

It can also be used as a mask once or twice a week: To use as a mask, apply a thick layer to the skin, leave for 5 minutes, wet, lather and rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with the eye area.

It is suitable for face and body use.

      Avoid contact with the eye area.

      Suitable for adult use only.

name: Sensibio Foaming Gel
description: Micellar cleansing gel that rinses off for sensitive and dehydrated skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is applied to damp skin that has been lightly moistened with water beforehand.

When applied to the face, it is foamed and then rinsed with plenty of water and then the skin is lightly dried.

It is suitable for use in the morning and/or evening for 7 days.

      If discomfort persists, consult your doctor.

name: ABCDerm Gentle Shampoo
description: A tear-free shampoo that gently cleanses the hair and scalp.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for weekly use as needed by babies' sensitive scalp.

  • Step 1 Apply to wet hair.
  • Step 2 Lather.
  • Step 3 Rinse thoroughly.
  • Step 4 Comb and style.

    For hygienic reasons, we recommend that you close the product tightly after use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

See the table of contents

name: Sébium Global
description: Anti-acne care cream for acne-prone skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for use 1/2 times a day.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin with Sébium H2O, Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium Foaming Gel Active.
  • Step 2 Pour the product onto your finger.
  • Step 3 Apply the product to your face with slow movements, as if massaging.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Skin spots may occur due to changes in sebum structure.##NewLine## This technology* supports the synthesis and regulation of sebum structure. *SeboRestore Technology [Fluidactiv Patent - Bakuchiol].

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sébium Global Cover
description: Tinted care cream with anti-acne and concealing effect for acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for use:

  • Step 1 Make sure your hands are clean before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Cleanse your skin with Sébium H2O, Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium Foaming Gel Active.
  • Step 3 First, apply the green concealer on the lid to the areas where your skin appears red.
  • Step 4 Then, unscrew the cap of the product and spread the colored liquid all over your face.
  • Step 5 Since it has a fluid texture, close the lid tightly after each use.

name: Sébium Global Cover
description: Tinted care cream with anti-acne and concealing effect for acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for use:

  • Step 1 Make sure your hands are clean before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Cleanse your skin with Sébium H2O, Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium Foaming Gel Active.
  • Step 3 First, apply the green concealer on the lid to the areas where your skin appears red.
  • Step 4 Then, unscrew the cap of the product and spread the colored liquid all over your face.
  • Step 5 Since it has a fluid texture, close the lid tightly after each use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Skin spots may occur due to changes in sebum structure.##NewLine## This technology* supports the synthesis and regulation of sebum structure. *SeboRestore Technology [Fluidactiv Patent - Bakuchiol].

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sebium H2O
description: Rinse-free micellar cleansing water for combination, oily and acne-prone skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Can be used in the morning and/or evening.

  • Step 1 Pour the product onto a piece of cotton.
  • Step 2 Gently cleanse your skin/remove make-up.
  • Step 3 No rinsing required.

    Not suitable for use around the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

NAOS is the inventor of Micellar technology. Inspired by the natural lipids in the skin, Micellar Particles are micro-droplets that cleanse the skin of dirt and makeup. This technology protects the skin barrier while cleansing the skin of dirt and makeup.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sensibio H2O
description: Rinse-free micellar cleansing water for sensitive skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for morning/evening use

  • Step 1 Moisten a cotton pad with Sensibio H2O.
  • Step 2 Gently cleanse your skin and/or remove make-up from your face and around your eyes.
  • Step 3 Reapply until completely removed.
  • Step 4 Gently pat your face dry with a clean towel.
  • Step 5 can be used for 7 days.

name: Sensibio H2O
description: Rinse-free micellar cleansing water for sensitive skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for morning/evening use

  • Step 1 Moisten a cotton pad with Sensibio H2O.
  • Step 2 Gently cleanse your skin and/or remove make-up from your face and around your eyes.
  • Step 3 Reapply until completely removed.
  • Step 4 Gently pat your face dry with a clean towel.
  • Step 5 can be used for 7 days.
