name: ABCDerm H2O
description: Cleansing micellar water that does not require rinsing for babies' diaper area, face and eye area.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
As often as necessary. Every day.

  • Step 1 Wet the cotton.
  • Step 2 Cleanse gently.
  • Step 3 Repeat until the cotton remains clean.
  • Step 4 Pat dry gently.

    It can be used on newborn babies. (Except premature babies). Apply to healthy skin.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

NAOS is the inventor of Micellar technology. Inspired by the natural lipids in the skin, Micellar Particles are micro-droplets that cleanse the skin of dirt and makeup. This technology protects the skin barrier while cleansing the skin of dirt and makeup.

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

name: Hydrabio H2O
description: Moisturizing, rinse-free cleansing micellar water for dehydrated skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Cleanse the skin and/or remove make-up with a piece of cotton. No rinsing required.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Water and lipids are indispensable components for the skin as they keep the skin moist. If there is any imbalance in the skin, moisture loss occurs and the skin begins to function improperly. This patented complex supports the synthesis of skin lipids and aquaporins. These "water channels", which have the task of transporting water to the epidermal cells, are found in the natural structure of the skin.

NAOS is the inventor of Micellar technology. Inspired by the natural lipids in the skin, Micellar Particles are micro-droplets that cleanse the skin of dirt and makeup. This technology protects the skin barrier while cleansing the skin of dirt and makeup.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sensibio H2O Eye
description: A dual-phase micellar cleanser for the delicate eye area and lips that removes waterproof make-up and strengthens lashes.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for daily use in the morning and/or evening.

  • Step 1 Shake well before use to ensure homogeneous distribution of the biphasic solution.
  • Step 2 Remove eye and lip makeup with a piece of cotton.
  • Step 3 No rinsing required.
  • Step 4 Suitable for contact lens wearers.

    Shake well before use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
The first step to healthy skin is skin cleansing. Especially when it comes to the most sensitive areas of our face, the eye area and lips, care should be taken to ensure that the cleansing and care products used are dermocosmetic products that protect the natural flora of the skin.

Removing makeup, especially waterproof makeup, while respecting the skin's natural balance is an important step in skin health.

Indeed, the eye contour is a particularly sensitive and vulnerable area: the skin is thinner, the protective hydrolipidic film is less (fewer sebaceous glands) and it is an area more vulnerable to external factors and where moisture loss occurs more quickly. For all these reasons, discomforts such as redness, burning, stinging can easily occur. Eyelashes are also one of the important areas of the eye contour and are among the areas that require special attention in their cleaning and care, both for aesthetic purposes and to protect the eye from external factors.

It is important to know that the area around the lips is as sensitive as the area around the eyes. Just like around the eyes, the hydrolipidic film is less (less oil glands) and is more vulnerable to external factors.

For all these reasons, care should be taken to ensure that the products used for the sensitive eye area, eyelashes and lips are compatible with the pH of the skin, suitable for the use of the most sensitive skin and are dermocosmetic products that increase the skin's tolerance level.

Tested under dermatological and ophthalmological control

PROVITAMIN B5:

Strengthens eyelashes and skin barrier.

Deeply moisturizes the eye area and lips.

DUAL PHASE MICELARY WATER TECHNOLOGY:

It instantly and perfectly removes waterproof make-up in one go.

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:

Thanks to its active ingredients, it helps soothe the eye area and lips by deeply moisturizing them.

See resources
See resources

*Evaluation of the efficacy of Sensibio H2O Eye in 30 healthy volunteers with sensitive skin and eye contour under dermatological and ophthalmological supervision, Eurofins, Spain 2021

93% Strengthens eyelashes and skin barrier.*

Removes 95% waterproof makeup.*

97% Deeply moisturizes the eye area and lips.*

See resources
See resources

*Evaluation of the efficacy of Sensibio H2O Eye in 30 healthy volunteers with sensitive skin and eye contour under dermatological and ophthalmological supervision, Eurofins, Spain 2021

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The dual-phase micellar water technology, which perfectly removes waterproof make-up, removes waterproof make-up from the eye area and lips with its optimized lipophilic phase (30%). The phase, rich in powerful cleansing micelles (70%), removes make-up and protects the skin's natural flora. The 30:70 ratio between the phases leaves a soothing feeling on the eye area and lips, while ensuring optimum effectiveness and tolerance levels for the eye area and lips, the most sensitive areas of our face.

name: Sebium Hydra
description: Intensive moisturizing and soothing care cream for skin that experiences intense dryness as a result of drying dermatological applications.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied once or twice a day.

  • Step 1 Make sure your hands are clean before touching the products to your face.
  • Step 2 Cleanse your face with Sensibio H2O or Sensibio Foaming Gel.
  • Step 3 Pour the product onto your finger.
  • Step 4 Apply the product to your face by drawing oval circles with soft movements.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

name: Hydrabio Hyalu+ Serum
description: An effective, plumping and intensive moisturizing care serum containing hyaluronic acid for dehydrated skin against signs of premature aging.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for daily use in the morning and/or evening.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin with Hydrabio H2O.
  • Step 2 Apply approximately 5 drops to face, neck and décolleté.
  • Step 3 It is also suitable for use as a make-up base.

name: Sebium Hydra Cleanser
description: A soothing, balm-textured cleanser for acne-prone and sensitive skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for daily use, morning and evening.

  • Step 1 Apply morning and/or evening to wet skin.
  • Step 2 Massage gently and rinse thoroughly. Pat dry without rubbing.
  • Step 3 Next, moisturize your skin with Sébium Hydra.
  • Step 4 Can also be used as a make-up remover.
  • Step 5 Suitable for face and body use. Suitable for use as long as skin sensitivity continues after drying medical treatment.

name: ABCDerm Hydratant
description: Nourishing and protective care milk for baby skin at high risk of intense skin dryness.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for Use:

  • Step 1 Cleanse the skin with ABCDerm hygiene products.
  • Step 2 Apply gently to dry skin.
  • Step 3 Can be used once or twice daily.

    • Do not use in premature babies.
    • Do not apply to leaking or damaged areas.
    • If dryness persists, consult your doctor.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Bacteria are naturally found in the skin and play an important role in maintaining the skin's balance. However, when we talk about atopic-prone skin, the presence of these bacteria in excess on the skin makes the situation even more difficult. This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

The skin has a natural skin barrier that protects it from external factors. In dry and atopic skin, this barrier loses its lipids and proteins and cannot fulfill its function. This technology helps to re-establish an effective skin barrier.

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

See the table of contents

  • GLYCERIN

  • HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL
  • BEHENYL ALCOHOL
  • SUCROSE STEARATE

name: ABCDerm Hydratant
description: Nourishing and protective care milk for baby skin at high risk of intense skin dryness.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for Use:

  • Step 1 Cleanse the skin with ABCDerm hygiene products.
  • Step 2 Apply gently to dry skin.
  • Step 3 Can be used once or twice daily.

    • Do not use in premature babies.
    • Do not apply to leaking or damaged areas.
    • If dryness persists, consult your doctor.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Bacteria are naturally found in the skin and play an important role in maintaining the skin's balance. However, when we talk about atopic-prone skin, the presence of these bacteria in excess on the skin makes the situation even more difficult. This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

The skin has a natural skin barrier that protects it from external factors. In dry and atopic skin, this barrier loses its lipids and proteins and cannot fulfill its function. This technology helps to re-establish an effective skin barrier.

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

name: Atoderm Intensive Balm
description: Moisturizing care cream for very dry and atopic-prone skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be applied once or twice a day to your skin cleansed with Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel, Atoderm Shower Oil or Atoderm Intensive Bar. It is suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults. It can be used on newborn babies (except premature babies).

  • Step 1 The 3-6-9 method is a brand new method of using the right amount of moisturizer, adapted to the age and physical structure of the person. It has been specially developed to get better results in the long term and to create a care routine after the moisturizing care cream used.
  • Step 2 3 pumps are required for a baby. (1 pump should be applied to the front of the chest, 1 pump to the back, 1 pump to the legs.)
  • Step 3 6 pumps are required for a child. (1 pump should be applied to the head and neck area, 1 pump to the front of the chest, 1 pump to the arms, 1 pump to the back area, 1 pump to the legs.)
  • Step 4 9 pumps are required for an adult. (1 pump should be applied to the head and neck area, 1 pump each to the arms, 1 pump to the front of the chest, 1 pump to the back area, 1 pump each to the front of the legs, 1 pump each to the back of the legs.)

    If your severe skin dryness persists, consult your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

The skin has a natural skin barrier that protects it from external factors. In dry and atopic skin, this barrier loses its lipids and proteins and cannot fulfill its function. This technology helps to re-establish an effective skin barrier.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

  • Step 3 Rinse thoroughly and pat dry gently.
  • Step 4 Can be used on face, body and hands.
  • Step 5 Suitable for use by babies, children and adults.

    If your intense skin dryness continues, consult your dermatologist.

name: Atoderm Intensive Eye
description: A moisturizing care cream that helps soothe and repair the eye area of very dry and atopic-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for Use:

  • Step 1 Apply once or twice daily.
  • Step 2 It can be used as a care cream during the day and as a care product and/or make-up remover with the help of a cotton pad in the evening.
  • Step 3 No rinsing required.
  • Step 4 It can be used around the eyes and face for daily use.
  • Step 5 Suitable for use by people who wear contact lenses or have sensitive eyes.
  • Step 6 is suitable for use by babies (except premature babies), children and adults.

It is suitable for use alone or in combination with dermocorticosteroids.

    • If intense dryness around the eyes persists, consult your dermatologist.
    • It is not suitable for use in premature babies.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Bacteria are naturally found in the skin and play an important role in maintaining the skin's balance. However, when we talk about atopic-prone skin, the presence of these bacteria in excess on the skin makes the situation even more difficult. This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

The skin has a natural skin barrier that protects it from external factors. In dry and atopic skin, this barrier loses its lipids and proteins and cannot fulfill its function. This technology helps to re-establish an effective skin barrier.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Atoderm Intensive Eye
description: A moisturizing care cream that helps soothe and repair the eye area of very dry and atopic-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for Use:

  • Step 1 Apply once or twice daily.
  • Step 2 It can be used as a care cream during the day and as a care product and/or make-up remover with the help of a cotton pad in the evening.
  • Step 3 No rinsing required.
  • Step 4 It can be used around the eyes and face for daily use.
  • Step 5 Suitable for use by people who wear contact lenses or have sensitive eyes.
  • Step 6 is suitable for use by babies (except premature babies), children and adults.

It is suitable for use alone or in combination with dermocorticosteroids.

    • If intense dryness around the eyes persists, consult your dermatologist.
    • It is not suitable for use in premature babies.

tabs.title: How to use

  • Step 1 Apply on damp skin

  • Step 4 Use with Atoderm Intensive Balm for effective results.
  • Step 5 Suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults (except premature babies).

name: Atoderm Intensive Gel-Cream
description: Intensive anti-itch nourishing, refreshing and moisturising gel cream for very dry and atopic-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply to clean skin once or twice daily.

The importance of using a moisturizing care cream should not be forgotten in atopic-prone skin. The skin should be moisturized deeply in the morning and evening.

  • Step 1 Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel can be applied once or twice a day to your skin cleansed with Atoderm Shower Oil or Atoderm Intensive Bar. It is suitable for use on skin prone to atopy.
  • Step 2 It can be used daily in all seasons. Thanks to its light gel texture, it is easily absorbed by the skin, especially in humid and hot weather conditions.
  • Step 3 It is suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults. It can be used on newborn babies (except premature babies).
  • Step 1 Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel can be applied once or twice a day to your skin cleansed with Atoderm Shower Oil or Atoderm Intensive Bar. It is suitable for use on skin prone to atopy.
  • Step 2 It can be used daily in all seasons. Thanks to its light gel texture, it is easily absorbed by the skin, especially in humid and hot weather conditions.
  • Step 3 It is suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults. It can be used on newborn babies (except premature babies).

If your severe dryness problem persists, consult your dermatologist.

The importance of using a moisturizing care cream should not be forgotten in atopic-prone skin. The skin should be moisturized deeply in the morning and evening.

  • Step 1 Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel can be applied once or twice a day to your skin cleansed with Atoderm Shower Oil or Atoderm Intensive Bar. It is suitable for use on skin prone to atopy.
  • Step 2 It can be used daily in all seasons. Thanks to its light gel texture, it is easily absorbed by the skin, especially in humid and hot weather conditions.
  • Step 3 It is suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults. It can be used on newborn babies (except premature babies).
  • Step 1 Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel can be applied once or twice a day to your skin cleansed with Atoderm Shower Oil or Atoderm Intensive Bar. It is suitable for use on skin prone to atopy.
  • Step 2 It can be used daily in all seasons. Thanks to its light gel texture, it is easily absorbed by the skin, especially in humid and hot weather conditions.
  • Step 3 It is suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults. It can be used on newborn babies (except premature babies).

If your severe dryness problem persists, consult your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Bacteria are naturally found in the skin and play an important role in maintaining the skin's balance. However, when we talk about atopic-prone skin, the presence of these bacteria in excess on the skin makes the situation even more difficult. This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Photoderm LEB SPF30 100ml
description: Sun protection in gel cream form for sensitive skin with low sun tolerance

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Sunscreens should be used in summer and winter and periodically throughout the day.

  • Step 1 Shake the can well before use.
  • Step 2 Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure.
  • Step 3: Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying.
  • Step 4 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

name: Cicabio Lotion Spray
description: Soothing spray lotion for damaged skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Use twice daily until the skin is completely dry.

      Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to visibly damaged or leaking skin. Apply only to affected area. Consult a healthcare professional if you have questions regarding use on children under 36 months or if skin irritation persists.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Discomfort and itching sensations can disrupt the skin's natural repair processes. This technology helps regulate skin reactivity.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Photoderm M SPF50+ Golden
description: Dark-tinted sunscreen with enhanced anti-dark spot protection and very high protection against blue light.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

      Shake the can well before use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
Provides 99.8% DNA protection against sun exposure.**

See resources
See resources

**Protection against DNA damage by sun-induced reactive oxygen species. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005.

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to its specially developed “Blue Light Protection”, it also provides protection against visible blue rays and prevents the formation of stain problems caused by these rays.

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

name: Sébium Mat Control
description: A care cream that helps control shine for combination and oily skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be used twice a day, morning and evening, or as often as the skin needs it.

  • Step 1 Apply morning and evening to skin cleansed with Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium H2O.
  • Step 2 Shake well before use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sébium Mat Control
description: A care cream that helps control shine for combination and oily skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It can be used twice a day, morning and evening, or as often as the skin needs it.

  • Step 1 Apply morning and evening to skin cleansed with Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium H2O.
  • Step 2 Shake well before use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sensibio Micellar Cleansing Oil
description: In the first stage of the double-phase cleansing for all skin types, including sensitive skin, a micellar cleansing oil that helps remove face and eye make-up and soothe the skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Suitable for daily use. Suitable for all skin types for double-stage cleansing.

  • Step 1 Apply the product to your dry skin.
  • Step 2 Gently massage your skin using circular motions with your fingers.
  • Step 3 Mix the product on your skin with water to turn it into milk form.
  • Step 4 Continue massaging with circular movements and then rinse thoroughly with water.

    Do not forget to consult your dermatologist if necessary.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
99% Removes daily dirt and sunscreen from the skin (1)

Removes 98% waterproof eye and lip makeup (1)

95% Instant soothing effect (1) (2)

95% Nourishes the skin (3)

See resources
See resources

(1)Consumer test conducted in China on 121 participants for 21 days, satisfaction percentage after immediate use.

(2)Self-assessment of the relaxing effect after use on 20 participants, percentage of satisfaction immediately after use.

(3) Satisfaction percentage of user test conducted with 60 participants for 21 days under dermatological and ophthalmological control

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

NAOS is the inventor of Micellar technology. Inspired by the natural lipids in the skin, Micellar Particles are micro-droplets that cleanse the skin of dirt and makeup. This technology protects the skin barrier while cleansing the skin of dirt and makeup.

name: Photoderm MINERAL Fluid SPF50+
description: Very high sun protection with 100% mineral filters for sensitive skin with chemical filter allergies and atopy-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Shake well until you hear the sound of the balls inside. Apply generously and evenly before sun exposure. Suitable for face and body use. Re-apply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes. Suitable for use by babies, children and adults from 6 months.

      Shake the can well before use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to the Cellular Protection™ patent in its formula, it helps protect cells against harmful UV rays and prevents premature aging of the skin. With its maximum anti-UVB effect and unique UVA inhibitor performance, it provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun.**

name: Sébium NIGHT PEEL
description: Intensive night serum with purifying and strong peeling effect

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
For best results, apply every day or every other day only in the evenings for a 4-week treatment .

  • Step 1 First cleanse your skin with Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium H2O.
  • Step 2 Then apply Sébium Night Peel to your skin in a thin layer.
  • Step 3 No rinsing required.
  • Step 4 After the product stays on your skin all night, cleanse your skin in the morning to remove the product.
  • Step 5 After completing the 4-week cure, it is necessary to wait 1 month for the next application.
  • Step 6 During use, exposure to sunlight should be avoided and a sunscreen appropriate for your skin type should be used.
  • Step 7 Avoid contact with the eye area.

    • May cause discomfort or slight redness on sensitive skin; in this case, use less frequently.
    • Avoid contact with eyes.
    • Avoid continuous and prolonged sun exposure during use.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
• Adult/young women and men prefer dermatological peeling treatments that peel the epidermis layer with chemical agents to reduce acne and blackhead problems on their skin and to restore the skin's natural glow.
  • However, these treatments are expensive, take a long time to complete, and can be irritating, especially for sensitive skin.
  • Peeling products suitable for home use are ideal for those who have difficulty adapting to dermatological treatments and want to use a peeling product.
Dermatologically tested.

  • Reduces blackhead problem by -23.5% . (1)
  • 75% more radiant skin. (2)
See resources
See resources

Use test to evaluate the effectiveness of Sébium Night Peel after a four-week (28-day) use program under normal conditions (evening application only), performed on 20 volunteers aged 22-50 with combination and slightly sensitive skin, CIREC, 2018.

(1) Assessment of the cutaneous safety and non-comedogenicity of Sébium Night Peel under normal use conditions (one application per day in the evening), conducted for 28 days on 22 volunteers aged 20–55 with combination, oily and acne-prone skin, Eurofins 2018.


(2) Use test to evaluate the effectiveness of Sébium Night Peel after a four-week (28-day) use program under normal conditions (evening application only), performed with 20 volunteers aged 22-50 years with combination and mild skin conditions, CIREC, 2018.

description: A brightening and firming night care cream that helps reduce the appearance of spots for sensitive skin with blemish problems.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is applied to the face and neck area cleaned with Pigmentbio H2O or Pigmentbio Foaming Cream in the evening. It is suitable for use alone or in combination with Pigmentbio C-Concentrate at night. For effective results, it is recommended to use Pigmentbio Daily Care SPF 50+ as sunscreen.

      Suitable for adult use only.

      It should only be used at night and the skin should be thoroughly cleaned with a suitable cleansing product in the morning.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on the unique principle of NAOS. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Melanin is a pigment found naturally in the skin that gives it color. Irregular and excessive melanin production causes dark spots and color inequality. This technology supports cell renewal to regulate melanin production and remove excess melanin.

name: Photoderm NUDE Touch SPF50+ Light
description: Very high sun protection with 100% mineral filters and natural covering effect for combination, oily and acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Apply to the skin after the moisturizing care cream. Shake well until you hear the sound of the beads inside. Apply generously and evenly to the face before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The high-tech Sun Active Defense™ patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun** with its strengthened content against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays.

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

description: Intensive nourishing care cream for the face area of very dry and mature skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning and evening use.

  • Step 1 Cleanse the face or neck area with Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel or Atoderm Intensive Bar.
  • Step 2 Then apply Atoderm Nutrition Cream.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. Ask.Naos is a platform that transparently shares the ingredients of the NAOS brands (Bioderma, Institut Esthederm and Etat Pur). Designed to provide a high level of transparency, this platform shows you everything you need to know about the origin and role of the ingredients and patents based on NAOS' ecobiology principles. For the past 40 years, NAOS has respected the natural resources and mechanisms of the skin that need to be protected in order to have a healthier and more beautiful skin in the long term.

Discover All Content and Details at ask.NAOS.com.tr

name: Atoderm Nutrition Cream
description: Intensive nourishing care cream for the face area of very dry and mature skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning and evening use.

  • Step 1 Cleanse the face or neck area with Atoderm Intensive Foaming Gel or Atoderm Intensive Bar.
  • Step 2 Then apply Atoderm Nutrition Cream.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Hydrabio Perfecteur SPF 30
description: Moisturizing care cream that protects against UV rays and gives radiance to dehydrated skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: It is applied in the morning to the face and neck area that has been previously cleansed with Hydrabio H2O or Hydrabio Milky Cleanser and treated with Hydrabio Tonique.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Water and lipids are indispensable components for the skin as they keep the skin moist. If there is any imbalance in the skin, moisture loss occurs and the skin begins to function improperly. This patented complex supports the synthesis of skin lipids and aquaporins. These "water channels", which have the task of transporting water to the epidermal cells, are found in the natural structure of the skin.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

Discover All Content and Details at ask.NAOS.com.tr

name: Cicabio Pomade
description: A care cream that helps reduce changes in the epidermis due to excessive dryness or after laser and peeling applications.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is applied to the cleaned area twice a day until the problem is resolved. It is suitable for face, lip and body care. It can be used on adult, child and baby skin.

      If discomfort persists, consult your doctor. Apply only to healthy skin. This product is not a medicine.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Discomfort and itching sensations can disrupt the skin's natural repair processes. This technology helps regulate skin reactivity.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sébium PORE REFINER
description: Care cream that helps tighten pores for combination and oily skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning/evening use.

  • Step 1 Make sure your hands are clean and hygienic before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Cleanse your skin with Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium H2O.
  • Step 3 Pour the product onto your finger.
  • Step 4 Apply the cream slowly to your face as if massaging.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sébium PORE REFINER
description: Care cream that helps tighten pores for combination and oily skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning/evening use.

  • Step 1 Make sure your hands are clean and hygienic before touching your face.
  • Step 2 Cleanse your skin with Sébium Foaming Gel or Sébium H2O.
  • Step 3 Pour the product onto your finger.
  • Step 4 Apply the cream slowly to your face as if massaging.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Pigmentbio Sensitive Areas
description: A moisturizing and soothing care cream that helps reduce darkening in sensitive, private areas and joint areas and helps brighten the skin and even out the skin tone.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Apply once or twice a day after cleansing the affected sensitive area with Pigmentbio Foaming Cream. It can be used immediately after waxing, shaving, laser, etc. to prevent redness and uneven skin tone caused by sensitivity. Suitable for body use only.

      Suitable for adult use only.

tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The patented combination of active ingredients regulates the biological mechanisms that cause dark spots to form and provides optimum prevention with a brightening effect.

name: ABCDerm Relaxing Oil
description: Nourishing and soothing massage oil for the sensitive skin of babies and children.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Once a day - 7 days a week

  • Step 1 After the shower, warm the oil between your hands and gently rub it into your baby's skin.
  • Step 2 To prevent the drying effects of lime water, you can pour it directly into your bath water (1-2 doses are enough).

    Caution: May make the bathtub slippery. Avoid contact with eyes. Can be used on newborns except premature babies. Apply to healthy skin.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

As a skin biology specialist, BIODERMA’s research aims to preserve the natural balance of skin in all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. The main goal of the new ABCDerm range is to provide safe products for babies’ sensitive skin and to be sensitive to their sensitivities. SAFETY Reducing the risk of allergy thanks to carefully selected ingredients, eliminating known unsafe ingredients from the formulation and choosing hypoallergenic perfumes. EFFECTIVENESS Selecting the optimum doses of the purest molecules for dermatologically proven efficacy and complete skin compatibility. SENSITIVITY Reducing the number of active ingredients used in products to guarantee safety and skin comfort. TRACEABILITY Tracing all our products at every stage of the process, from production to point of sale, to guarantee user safety.

See the table of contents
Table of contents

  • HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL
  • PRUNUS ARMENIACA (APRICOT) KERNEL OIL

  • TOCOPHEROL
  • FRAGRANCE. [BI 638]

name: Sébium SENSTIVIE
description: Moisturizing care cream for acne-prone skin that has become dry and sensitive as a result of drying medical treatment.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning and evening use.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin with Sébium H2O, Sébium Foaming Gel Active or Sébium Foaming Gel.
  • Step 2 Pour Sébium Sensitive onto two fingers.
  • Step 3 Apply to your face with circular massage movements.

    Avoid contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Eco-Design
tabs.html:
Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

We make improvements every day to minimize the environmental impact of our products. Most of our products are made from 100% recyclable plastic and all of our outer boxes are made from 100% recyclable paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Acne-prone skin can be extremely sensitive, especially when using certain medicated treatments. This technology helps soothe redness and discomfort.

Skin spots may occur due to changes in sebum structure.##NewLine## This technology* supports the synthesis and regulation of sebum structure. *SeboRestore Technology [Fluidactiv Patent - Bakuchiol].

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sébium SENSTIVIE
description: Moisturizing care cream for acne-prone skin that has become dry and sensitive as a result of drying medical treatment.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for morning and evening use.

  • Step 1 Cleanse your skin with Sébium H2O, Sébium Foaming Gel Active or Sébium Foaming Gel.
  • Step 2 Pour Sébium Sensitive onto two fingers.
  • Step 3 Apply to your face with circular massage movements.

    Avoid contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Eco-Design
tabs.html:
Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

We make improvements every day to minimize the environmental impact of our products. Most of our products are made from 100% recyclable plastic and all of our outer boxes are made from 100% recyclable paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Acne-prone skin can be extremely sensitive, especially when using certain medicated treatments. This technology helps soothe redness and discomfort.

Skin spots may occur due to changes in sebum structure.##NewLine## This technology* supports the synthesis and regulation of sebum structure. *SeboRestore Technology [Fluidactiv Patent - Bakuchiol].

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Hydrabio Serum
description: Intensive moisturizing serum for dehydrated skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: It can be applied morning and/or evening to the face and neck area that has been previously cleansed with Hydrabio H2O or Hydrabio Milky Cleanser and tightened with Hydrabio Tonique. It can be used alone or before Hydrabio series care products. It creates a perfect make-up base with its fluid and easily absorbed texture.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Water and lipids are indispensable components for the skin as they keep the skin moist. If there is any imbalance in the skin, moisture loss occurs and the skin begins to function improperly. This patented complex supports the synthesis of skin lipids and aquaporins. These "water channels", which have the task of transporting water to the epidermal cells, are found in the natural structure of the skin.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Sebium Serum
description: Effective care serum against signs of premature aging, helping to prevent the formation of acne, blackheads and acne spots for acne-prone skin.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It is suitable for daily use, morning and evening.

  • Step 1 Cleanse the skin in the morning and/or evening with Sébium H2O and/or Sébium Foaming Gel.
  • Step 2 Apply a few drops to face, neck and décolleté once or twice daily.
  • Step 3 Moisturize your skin with Sébium Kerato+ or Sébium Sensitive.
  • Step 4 It is also suitable for use as a make-up base.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Proven effect
tabs.html:
91% reduction in pore appearance*

76% reduction in acne scar appearance*

82% reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles*

See resources
See resources

*Clinical study conducted with 33 volunteers for 4 weeks under dermatological control

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Changes in sebum fluidity can cause acne. This patented complex fights against sebum thickening, preventing pores from clogging and minimizing the risk of acne formation.

name: Atoderm Shower Oil
description: Rinse-off shower oil for dry, sensitive and atopic-prone skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for use

  • Step 1 In the shower or bath, apply to wet skin and rinse gently.
  • Step 2: To get more effective results, you can then choose Atoderm care products suitable for your skin.
  • Step 3 Suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults.

    If your skin dryness persists, consult your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Bacteria are naturally found in the skin and play an important role in maintaining the skin's balance. However, when we talk about atopic-prone skin, the presence of these bacteria in excess on the skin makes the situation even more difficult. This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

tabs.title: Detailed Content Information
tabs.html:
In a world where we increasingly want to know more about the ingredients of the products we apply to our skin, Ask.Naos was created to help you choose the most suitable product for your skin. Ask.Naos is a platform that transparently shares the ingredients of the NAOS brands (Bioderma, Institut Esthederm and Etat Pur). Designed to provide a high level of transparency, this platform shows you everything you need to know about the origin and role of the ingredients and patents based on NAOS' ecobiology principles. For the past 40 years, NAOS has respected the natural resources and mechanisms of the skin that need to be protected in order to have a healthier and more beautiful skin in the long term.

Discover All Content and Details at ask.NAOS.com.tr

name: Atoderm Shower Oil
description: Rinse-off shower oil for dry, sensitive and atopic-prone skin

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
Instructions for use

  • Step 1 In the shower or bath, apply to wet skin and rinse gently.
  • Step 2: To get more effective results, you can then choose Atoderm care products suitable for your skin.
  • Step 3 Suitable for face and body use for babies, children and adults.

    If your skin dryness persists, consult your dermatologist.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: COMPONENTS
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Bacteria are naturally found in the skin and play an important role in maintaining the skin's balance. However, when we talk about atopic-prone skin, the presence of these bacteria in excess on the skin makes the situation even more difficult. This patent helps prevent the bacteria from adhering to the skin surface.

External factors can cause the skin to react and become sensitive. Bioderma aims to increase the tolerance threshold of the skin, regardless of skin type, thanks to its patented DAF complex. This patent was designed by NAOS Research in Aix-en-Provence and developed at Bioderma Laboratories.

name: Photoderm SPOT SPF 50+
description: A very high protection sunscreen for skin that has blemish problems or is at risk of blemishes.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
The can should be shaken well before use.

  • Step 1 Apply generously and evenly before sun exposure and water.
  • Step 2 Should be repeated frequently, especially after swimming and activities that prevent the product from remaining on the skin surface.

    Babies and young children should not be exposed to direct sun.

    Prolonged exposure to the sun can cause serious health problems.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

When the skin is exposed to the sun for too long, it activates its natural defense mechanisms to protect itself from cellular damage. However, this mechanism can sometimes be inadequate. This patented complex plays a supporting role in strengthening the natural defense mechanisms of skin cells against the negative effects of sun rays.

name: Photoderm Spray SPF50+
description: Spray form sunscreen that provides very high protection for all skin types, face and body.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
To open the product for the first time, pull the 2 white parts and press the spray head a few times.

Apply generously and evenly to face and body before sun exposure. Spray into your hands before applying to face. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

It is suitable for use by children over 1 year old.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

description: Very high sun protection that does not require spreading after application and is suitable for use on all skin types.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Shake well before sun exposure and spray from a distance of 20 cm. Apply generously and evenly. Suitable for face and body use. When using on the face, squeeze the product into the palm of your hand and apply by hand. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to the Cellular Protection™ patent in its formula, it helps protect cells against harmful UV rays and prevents premature aging of the skin. With its maximum anti-UVB effect and unique UVA inhibitor performance, it provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun.**

name: Photoderm Stick SPF50+ 8 GR
description: Sun protection in stick form for all skin types and sensitive areas such as the eye area, lips, ears and nose.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Suitable for all skin types and sensitive areas such as the eye contour, lips, ears, and nose. Suitable for adults. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
This product is formulated based on NAOS' unique principle. Instead of trying to over-treat the skin, the skin should be taught how to protect its natural mechanism. At the heart of this product is:

Thanks to the Cellular Protection™ patent in its formula, it helps protect cells against harmful UV rays and prevents premature aging of the skin. With its maximum anti-UVB effect and unique UVA inhibitor performance, it provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun.**

The high-tech Sun Active Defense ™* patent provides 99.8% DNA protection against the sun with its content strengthened against UVA rays and effective performance against UVB rays. It supports the protection of cells and the prevention of premature aging of the skin by strengthening the skin's self-defense mechanism against the sun with unique UV filters and patented biological protection. *Sun Active DefenseTM: BIODERMA patent **Protection against DNA damage caused by reactive oxytocin species formed by the sun. In vitro study on human melanocytes, 2005

name: Photoderm Sun Mist SPF50+
description: Very high sun protection that does not require spreading after application and is suitable for use on all skin types.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html: Shake well before sun exposure and spray from a distance of 20 cm. Apply generously and evenly. Suitable for face and body use. When using on the face, squeeze the product into the palm of your hand and apply by hand. Reapply every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

name: Photoderm XDefense Ultra-Fluid SPF50+ Very Light
description: A water-based, fluid textured, tinted sunscreen suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, providing very high protection against environmental pollution and UVA/UVB rays.

tabs.title: How to use
tabs.html:
It should be reapplied every 2 hours and especially after swimming, sweating and towel drying. It is recommended not to come into contact with fabric.

  • Step 1 Shake well before use.
  • Step 2 Apply to your face and neck before sun exposure.
  • Step 3 Avoid direct contact with eyes.

tabs.title: Recycling instructions
tabs.html: Don't forget to recycle the product packaging

tabs.title: Components
tabs.html:
